com.jcabi.http.request

Class ApacheRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcabi.http.request.ApacheRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Request

    @Immutable
@Loggable(value=1)
public final class ApacheRequest
extends Object
implements Request
    Implementation of Request, based on Apache HTTP client.

    The class is immutable and thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.8
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
    Suppressed Checkstyle violations:
    ClassDataAbstractionCoupling (500 lines)
